channel.title: Opensuse on crashdot.com
channel.description: Recent content in Opensuse on crashdot.com

item.title: OpenSUSE: 4 months in
item.description: Maybe it is time for a little update, even if there is not much to say. After 4 months of running OpenSUSE Tumbleweed, I can honestly say I have not had a single moment where I’d thought I should maybe look for another distribution because XYZ is getting too annoying. Of course it does have some annoyances. Some are with me, like running systemd-boot while it is not officially ready for primetime yet.
